experiences.title: Back-end Developer
experiences.subtitle: Akluvis
workDescription: Developed a state-of-the-art GraphQL API from zero using Node.js, TypeScript, and Prisma, leading to a 40% increase in data exchange efficiency between the Three.js/React frontend and the backend, thus significantly enhancing application performance.
Optimized complex database queries and data manipulation with PostgreSQL, achieving a 30% faster query response time and ensuring data integrity.

Worked in close partnership with the frontend team to design and implement over 200 GraphQL schemas, re-solvers, and mutations, enabling a quicker data retrieval and manipulation process for improved user experience.

Instituted sophisticated authentication and authorization protocols using GraphQL directives and JWT tokens, achieving a 99.99% success rate in safeguarding against unauthorized access and ensuring data privacy.

experiences.title: Full Stack Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Ksense Technologies
workDescription: Led the design and development of user-friendly interfaces and robust back-end services for innovative web-based applications, utilizing Next.js and TypeScript. Aim for a 20% increase in user engagement through enhanced UI/UX design.
Drive the development of efficient database models, expertly managing data with PostgreSQL and Prisma, to ensure 99.9% data integrity and seamless functionality across our digital platforms.
Innovate in server-side logic with Node.js and Express, contributing to the development of dynamic applications that are 25% more scalable than our previous solutions.
Exhibit expertise in promptly identifying and resolving application issues, reducing downtime by 40% and enhancing overall user satisfaction ratings by 15%

experiences.title: Full Stack Mobile Developer
experiences.subtitle: Bazar Enterprises LLC
workDescription: Led the successful migration of a SwiftUI application to React Native, enabling compatibility with Android devices, thereby expanding the user base by 25%.
Developed and optimized over 50 reusable UI components, reducing code duplication by 40%.
Achieved seamless integration between mobile applications and a Django/PostgreSQL server, resulting in an increase in data retrieval speed and enhancing user experience.
Accelerated project timelines through the integration of third-party modules, streamlining development processes and enhancing project efficiency
